itemInfo.itemDesc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Coal.

item.name: Coal
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be Produced at Keplan Quarry, Glutoni Cave, Omar Lava Cave. It can be Gathered with a Pickaxe.

item.name: Bunch of Coal
item.desc: Coal is considered to be a high-quality fuel that only those with money can afford.
